title: ScheduleConfig
description: Configuration for creating or updating a workflow schedule

workflowName.title: Workflow Name
workflowName.description: Name of the workflow to schedule

cronExpression.title: Cron Expression
cronExpression.description: Cron expression defining the schedule (e.g., '0 0 * * *' for daily at midnight)

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Whether the schedule should be enabled

maxExecutions.title: Max Executions
maxExecutions.description: Maximum number of executions (-1 for unlimited)

input.title: Input Data
input.description: Default input data for scheduled executions

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Tags to associate with the schedule
